title: The Hymn
additional-note: The April 1959 issue is the first that has an associated contribution renewal record specifically citing this publication.  However, there may be other hymns and musical works that were published or reprinted in this periodical, both before and after this issue, that still have active copyrights.  We have not systematically checked such copyrights, and recommend that users do so for any music or lyrics in this periodical they may copy or reuse.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
